string.text: Are you ready for an upgrade?

Well greetings tramp... I have the connections for updating military armor. Strengthening and installation of PNV. Not to expensive for you, but I need some extra rubles for when I get out of this miserable zone...
Its an excellent offer...
What updates can you offer for military suits?
The Device of night vision...
On what suit to establish the device, on usual or already strengthened?
On the usual...
Excellent... Choose the suit model.
The Suit of "Berill-5M"...
The Suit 'SKAT-9M' ...
The Suit 'SKAT-10M ...
Suit VDV...
The Exoskeleton of military men...
The Army bullet-proof vest...
Medical "Beryl"...

"Digital"...

"Psi effect"...

Raven's Inventory:

1. TOZ-34, Saiga12k, BM-16 'scattergun', M4A1-Taktikal, Desert Eagle : In exchange for 2 Controller hands
2. Bizon, Kriss Super-V, MP-7a3 : In exchange for 4 Burer's hands
3. 12x70 'buck'(x3), 12x70 'slug'(x2), 12x70 'dart'(x1) : In exchange for 5 Pseudodog's tails
4. 9x39mm 'PAB9'(x4), 9x39mm 'SP5'(x3), 9x39mm 'AP'(x2) : In exchange for 10 Blind Dog's tails

Raven's Special Offers:

'Marked One' .. I have heard that the Bandits have found a hiding place in the Dark Valley full of weapons .. The interesting thing about them though, is that they are from the late 19th and early 20th centuries .. can you believe that?! You see they have been buried there since long before both World Wars .. A few days ago, a couple of Duty members came to see for a snack, and told him all about it!! I have this Client .. an odd fellow from outside the Perimeter, that visits the Zone from time to time .. a Collector of sorts .. If I could only get my hands on some of those rare beauties!! .. I'd make a fortune!! .. If you find any 'interesting', or 'unique' weapons during your travels .. come see me, and we can do business .. I would certainly make it worth your while!!

Vitek Voron 'Raven'

Max's Inventory:

1. Flamethrower mixture : 12 bottles of Vodka

2. Colloidal Gas Canister : 5 bottles of Vodka

4. 9x39mm 'PAB9'(x3), 9x39mm 'AP'(x2) : 10 bottles of Vodka

The Bandit on a nickname "Rat", has written down during lifetime many secrets on the PDA. But not so long ago has been found by the dead... Borovs wants to return this PDA and assumes that the Vein can know something about it.

Seris, having learnt about death of Bes, asks to bring to it for compensation a box of the cartridges intending to Bes.
The Bullet, having learnt about death of Bes, asks to bring a box with cartridges to general Voroninu.
Signalmen of group 'Freedom' have intercepted the Bullet message. Lucas asks to bring to it a box of the cartridges intending to Bes.
Dan, the dealer in the marsh, asks you to find him some beer. For 10 cans he promises to give you a recipe for the transformation of an artefact...
Dan, the dealer in the marsh, asks you to carry a sack to Raven. Then bring back a sawn-off shotgun "Benelli M3"... For doing this, he promises to give a unique artefact...
